mapper.insert: insert into pd_order(account_no, sale_product_no, price) values(#{accountNo}, #{saleProductNo}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regdate , NVL(SUM(a.total),0) total FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date , sum(price) total FROM pd_order WHERE order_date BETWEEN to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') AND to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') GROUP BY order_date ORDER BY order_date ) a , (SELECT to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd')) b WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY b.dt ORDER BY b.dt

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regdate, NVL(SUM(a.cnt),0) count FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date , COUNT(*) cnt FROM pd_order WHERE order_date BETWEEN to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') AND to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') GROUP BY order_date ORDER BY order_date ) a ,(SELECT to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= to_date(trunc(sysdate)+1,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(trunc(sysdate)-6,'yy-mm-dd')) b WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY b.dt ORDER BY b.dt
select * from pd_order order by order_date desc
